transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon, Ashutosh sir.
Customer: Batayiye.
Executive: Ji sir, call aaya tha aapka?
Customer: Kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Shivan baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Shivan bhai.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji sir. Time mil gaya kya abhi aapko? Time mil gaya kya?
Customer: Haan sir, lunch mein tha. Bol hi jayenge na aapko message karne ke baad bhi aap log bhool jaate hain.
Executive: Nahi sir, aisi baat nahi hai. Aapne mujhe message kara, maine revert kara na sir ke bataiye main hoon yahan par kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi, aapne to message revert kara. Aapne us din kya bola tha ki madam abhi meeting hai uske baad main aapko meeting mein Google meet mein ya call karke solution karti hain. To wapas aaya kya aapka message ya madam ka?
Executive: Haan sir, us time na thoda closing tha.
Customer: Okay, nahi, sahi hai. Shivan bhai sahi hai. Uske dusre din aaya kya? Nahi, nahi sir.
Customer: Teesre din aaya kya? Pura week mein aaya kya? Aaj tak reply nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To bataiye abhi kya hoga phir? Kaise karenge?
Executive: Nahi nahi, wo baat bilkul theek hai aapki.
Customer: Batayiye sir, mujhe bataiye kya problem hai sir. Dekhte hain check karte hain.
Executive: Solution to abhi tak mila nahi aapki taraf se. Aap 10 din, 15 din bol ke to bas apna ticket raise hai usko close kar do uske baad main bhool jaun.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Kya problem ka solution mila kya abhi tak? Abhi aap bataiye sir.
Customer: Kya bataye? Aap dekh rahe hain na? Kya aapne dekha nahi usko main daily usme ye online hoon. Koi bhi buylead nahi hai, kuch nahi hai, koi inquiry nahi hai, kuch bhi nahi.
Executive: Sir, same issue chal raha hai kya buyleads ka sir?
Customer: Bhai aap, aap account manager hain na?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Dekh rahe hain na aap? To aap thoda to itna to kam se kam dekhte raho kabhi kabhi.
Executive: Aapne bola tha na wo jo products add karne ke the sir wo sab kar diye the. Uske baad bhi koi matlab relevant buyleads nahi show ho rahi hain kya?
Customer: Aap, aap check kijiyega ek baar aapke hisab se check kar lijiyega. Main kya usme purchase kar raha hoon, kya buy kar raha hoon, kya nahi kar raha hoon.
Executive: Industrial cleaning services hogi apne paas sir?
Customer: Nahi hai na. Industrial mein kya hai abhi housekeeping aayegi to housekeeping karne thodi jayenge. Aisa kitna buylead khatam kar diya maine?
Executive: Industry hai sir, industry. Ek baar dekhiye abhi Pune ke liye.
Customer: Bhai aisa hi hai bhai bata raha hoon. Maine aisa kitna inquiry ye buyleads buy kar liya, consume karke bas kuch nahi hai unke paas mein. Na GST verify hai, na unke paas koi company name hai, kuch nahi jisko marzi aaya usne post kar diya.
Executive: Nahi nahi, ye wali buylead achi hai. Isme likha hai industrial cleaning services.
Customer: Hmm. Aur inhone jo mark karwa rakha hai. Ji, ek baar open kijiye sir, ek baar open kijiye. Panel open kijiye.

Customer: Usme service provider ka location kya diya hai?
Executive: Service provider mang rahe hain location Pune.
Customer: Abhi ye apne Pune to Pune hum deal karte hain na sir?
Customer: Par karte hain wo log nahi prefer nahi karte na wo log.
Executive: Ek baar baat kar lenge sir baat karke.
Customer: Nahi, humne aisa kai logon ko baat kar liya usse koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Bol sakte hain sir hum pan India level pe deal karte hain. Pune ka to Pune mein hi humko chahiye. Pune ka hi koi local party chahiye unko.
Executive: Iske niche ek aur dikh raha hoga industrial cleaning height work services.
Customer: Nahi hai wo hamara kaam nahi hai boss wo nahi hai apna.
Executive: Ye apna nahi hai sir. Aapko pehle to sabse badi problem ye hai ki aap itna time se mere sath mein hai main cheeze kya aapko batata hoon aapke abhi tak nahi samajh paye apna ye service nahi hai. Jo humko isme inquiry dikh rahi hai wo hai hi nahi apne paas.
Executive: Hydro testing?
Customer: Hydro testing bhi nahi hai. Ye kya hai isme?
Executive: Niche dekhiye.
Executive: Service location inka bahar tha Maharashtra na hydro testing services business use ke liye chahiye inhe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main product hai heat exchanger, condenser, boiler.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ye hoga sir oil barrel oil barrel cleaning services.
Customer: Nahi hai, nahi hai, nahi hai wo apne matlab ka nahi hai.

Customer: Main pura sab check kar liya usme ek bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Apna condenser hai sir condenser cleaning services ye hai na?
Customer: Heat exchanger boiler haan.
Executive: Hai kya isme koi bhi?

Executive: Condenser cleaning services.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main check kar leta hoon sir Ashutosh sir, theek hai? Jaise hum pehle continue kar rahe the koshish karte hain dobara is cheez ko continue kare na. Buyleads wagera main share out karta hoon aapko aap dekhiyega. Jo hamari previous chat tha na.
Customer: Nahi wo jo aapne wo pehle bataya tha na incognic mode mein jaake wahan se search karo ye milega wo sab mere ko abhi nahi samjhana. Main bahut pareshan ho gaya hoon un cheezon se.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi wo nahi bolunga main kuch bhi aapko.
Executive: Asal mein pata hai kya hai?
Customer: Wo jaise hum chalate hain to hamara to chal jata hai sir incognito mode mein jaise aap dekh rahe honge screen share karke bhi humne dikhaya tha trade.indiamart.com pe buylead.
Customer: But wo aapko thoda sa create kar deta hai problem.
Customer: Nahi to ek kaam kijiye aapko OTP de deta hoon aap usme login kar lijiye OTP de dijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir OTP nahi nahi sir ye to illegal activities hai hum nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Isme kya illegal hai?
Executive: Nahi sir ye to aapka account hai na.
Customer: Aapka system agar hamare laptop mein nahi chal raha hai aur aapke mein chal raha hai to kya illegal hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir. Wo cheez ka nahi hai sir ki wo matlab nahi le sakte. To main product apna na sir jaise aapne mujhe pehle hi bata rakha hai condenser cleaning ho gaya isme basically zyada focus hame karna hai condenser cleaning pe aur hydro testing ho gayi ye jo apni services hai.
Customer: Hydro testing nahi hai. Hydro testing by product hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Ye condenser jab clean hota hai to uske sath mein hydro testing bhi ho jata hai wahin pe.
Executive: Achcha matlab wo complimentary hota hoga. Theek hai heat exchanger ho gaya sir condenser ho gaya AC plants ho gaya boiler ho gaya evaporator ho gaye ye hai na. Hmm hmm.
Executive: To inki buylead main check karta hoon. Theek hai aap dekh lijiyega kyuki apna na thoda sa kya tha aap na less active hai IndiaMART par. To wo jaise buylead nahi aa rahi hogi to aap nahi dekh pa rahe the. Sir koshish kijiye sir dobara active hoiye sir leads wagera jaise aapne dekhi hai use kijiye. Iske baki main pura continue active continue.
Customer: Teen char din se maine open kyuki teen char din main thoda dusre kaam mein tha isliye maine nahi dekh paya aisa hai.
Executive: Nahi dekh payenge. Koi issue nahi hai dekhiye Ashutosh sir baki support pura hi karunga main aapko jaise pehle hi kar rahe the hum. Same usi tarike se main aapko kya karta hoon buyleads wagera dobara reshare karta hoon aap dekhiyega. Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur koi bhi problem ho dekhiye maine to aapko jab raat mein message dega to maine likha tha yes sir phir uske baad aapka kuch message nahi aaya. Phir subah aapne likha tha yahan pe phir maine likha sir main available hoon. Unke paas to time hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir wo bas wahi hai senior hai thoda sa time nahi hota is wajah se baki aap befikar rahiye sir main hoon na aapke sath jab bhi koi bhi dikkat hai aap mujhe bataiyega definitely main aapki problem ko resolve karunga at that time hi. Theek hai ye solve karwaiyega uske baad mein se dekhte hain.
Executive: Theek hai to sir wo aapka basically hamare paas concern aaya tha connect hone ke liye close nahi karna hai boss.
Customer: Nahi nahi concern close hi nahi karna hai. Abhi isko aise hi rehne dijiye aise continue chalne dena jab tak ye problem ka solution nahi milta mujhe.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir. Hmm.

Customer: To kitna wait karna padega abhi mujhe aapki taraf se?
Executive: Ji sir?
Customer: Aapki taraf se kitna wait karna padega mujhe?
Executive: Main dekhta hoon sir buyleads wagera dobara check karta hoon same whatsapp pe aapko share karta hoon.
Customer: Haan theek hai okay.
Executive: Theek hai na? Okay. Haan okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Previous issues not resolved.

- Lack of follow-up from IndiaMART team.



Resolution:

- Executive will reshare buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive assured full support and problem resolution.

- Executive confirmed condenser cleaning as main product.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to check and share buyleads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, support, cleaning services, condenser, hydro testing
